item.title: Build Sustainable DApps with your own X Blaster with Custom Fees
item.dc:creator: ludmilalopes
item.description: TLDR: Integrating DEX.AG’s X Blaster with custom fees into your platform provides your users or smart contract with convenient native...
item.content:encoded:
TLDR: Integrating DEX.AG’s X Blaster with custom fees into your platform provides your users or smart contract with convenient native liquidity while allowing you to build a sustainable business model.

Liquidity is vital for the growth of DeFi

Users want to experience all DeFi has to offer. But often times to do that you need to swap between tokens or stablecoins. Liquidity is an important resource that enables DeFi’s composability and makes it possible for many DApps to function. It’s the blood that flows through the veins of DeFi.

For a smooth user experience, it’s essential to have a reliable liquidity at a decent price. DEXes are an obvious choice for reliable liquidity when designing an application or smart contract. However, relying on a single DEX comes with its disadvantages. For example, maybe the token your users want to trade isn’t listed or has extremely low liquidity causing costly price slippage.

DeFi is all about having options

If one DEX isn’t ideal, The obvious answer is to do what DeFi does best with money legos and combine the awesome powers of DEXes. That’s why we built our other service DEX.AG, a DEX aggregator. DEX.AG’s X Blaster let’s you trade multiple DEXes and even splits trades across the combination of DEXes that results in the best price. Each DEX has its strengths, the X Blaster combines those strengths and connects users with the DEX or DEXes that best suits their needs. Not to mention, the X Blaster’s API has a blazing fast response time that delivers available trades within a fraction of a second so users never wait.

X Blaster aggregates liquidity from popular DEXes:

  • 0x v3
  • Bancor
  • Curve
  • Kyber
  • Oasis
  • Uniswap
  • Synthetix
    …. and more

With each new update, new tokens, exchanges, and integrations like Compound cTokens and CHAI are added to the X Blaster. We focus on token listings and improving your integrated X Blaster so you can focus on what matters.

Custom fees enable flexible and sustainable business models

We built DEX.AG because we understand the power of bringing the community together and the value that can create. We see our proxy contracts with custom fees as an opportunity for teams build sustainable models and grow their communities.

We know how crucial the right business model can be to finding the perfect product-market fit. You choose the custom fees on your X Blaster proxy contract. Developers know their users best and this gives them the flexibility to grow their community on their terms.

X Blaster in action

Want to witness the X Blaster in action? You can trade using the X Blaster on DEX.AG. Here are examples of the X Blaster integrated directly into two of the most popular wallets in the Ethereum community.

MyCrypto Beta

MyCrypto Beta users can take advantage of the X Blaster under the Swap Assets.

MyEtherWallet

MEW recently rolled out the X Blaster to its Android users.

Get your own X Blaster and level up your UX/UI

Once integrated, the X Blaster puts the hottest new DEXes and tokens just a few taps away. You can focus on your core product while your users get the liquidity they need conveniently right inside your application. And to top it off, when we ship updates to the X Blaster (which is quite often) you don’t have to lift a finger to reap the benefits in your platform.

Give your users what they want and get your own X Blaster today! Head over to our API/SDK documention to get started.

item.title: How to make money on DeFi (Hint: It’s not hard.)
item.dc:creator: ludmilalopes
item.description: Decentralized finance (DeFi) is changing the way people interact with their money.Â However, we know it can be a lot...
item.content:encoded:
Decentralized finance (DeFi) is changing the way people interact with their money.Â  However, we know it can be a lot to take in. Don’t worry, because we’ve put together this quick guide to give you jump start.

Start making money on DeFi in 4 steps

If you’re familiar with Ethereum, these steps will only take a few minutes. And when it’s all said and done, you’ll be earning interest in DAI every block.Â However if you’re completely new to Ethereum,Â you may instead want to check outÂ Zero to DeFi, a beginner’s guide which breaks down the entire process of getting a wallet, acquiring ETH, and lending out your DAI.

1. Get ETH into an address that you own

As the saying goes, if you don’t hold the private keys to the wallet, then they aren’t your coins. So, be sure to perform these steps from a wallet that you hold the private keys to. And, don’t forget to keep them backed up somewhere safe.

2. Head toÂ DEX.AG and sell most of that ETH for DAI

DEX.AG is a decentralized exchange or DEX aggregator that gets you the best price available from several of the most popular DEXes. It even splits your trade across multiple DEXes if it improves the price, all in one transaction.Â Make sure to leave a little ETH leftover for gas fees.

3. Go to DeFi Pulse’sÂ Earn Income page

DeFi Pulse is a site where you can find the latest analytics and rankings of DeFi protocols. The DeFi Pulse Earn Income page compares the interest rates you can earn from DeFi lending protocols.

4. Pick a lending protocol, and start earning interest

Enter the asset and amount you wish to lend to find which lending protocol has the best interest rate. Pick a protocol and click the ‘Next’ button which will redirect you to that app/service. Compound finance is currently the most popular lending protocol. Follow the app’s instructions to begin lending out your DAI and start earning interest.

And then later, when you’re ready to cash out…

Head back to the lending protocol you chose and use your private key to unlock the DAI plus interest generated whenever you want. There’s no “lock-in” period or time you have to wait before earning interest. Your DAI is earning interest every block until you choose to stop.

Still have questions?Â Come chat us in ourÂ Discord and stay up-to-date on the world of DeFi by following us on Twitter.
